actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to make certain corrections in copyright law.
short_title: Work Made for Hire and Copyright Corrections Act of 2000

summary.text: Work Made For Hire and Copyright Corrections Act of 2000 - Amends Federal copyright provisions to remove sound recordings from the list of works covered by the definition of "work made for hire." Makes such amendment effective as of November 29, 1999 (the enactment date of the provision that included sound recordings in such definition).

titles.title: Work Made for Hire and Copyright Corrections Act of 2000
A bill to make certain corrections in copyright law.
